name: Tennisstar 1
description:
Offline single player tennis game where you need to win 7 points to win the match, 3 times in a row to win the tournament. Are you ready?

This is an amateur level tournament, you need to hit the ball back in play once it's out. It's not coming back automatically (just like beginning tournaments of small clubs)

Move: Joystick

Hit: walk to the ball, the player will hit the ball himself

Serve:  button

Aim: touch and hold until it reaches the position you like.

It will automatically move to the center again once you let go!
